After discharge, the pain recurred, accompanied by several episodes of emesis. Upon return to the hospital, workup revealed elevated lipase levels above 3000 and persistent pain in the RUQ and epigastric region, milder than before.

Previous right lower extremity orthopedic procedures and back surgery.
